segment.source: After you deploy Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you can configure and use MBAM to manage enterprise BitLocker encryption.

segment.source: This section describes post-installation, day-to-day BitLocker encryption management tasks that can be accomplished by using MBAM.

segment.source: Reset a TPM Lockout with MBAM
segment.target: Reset a TPM Lockout with MBAM

segment.source: A Trusted Platform Module (TPM) microchip provides basic security-related functions.
segment.target: A Trusted Platform Module (TPM) microchip provides basic security-related functions.

segment.source: These functions are accomplished primarily by the use of encryption keys.
segment.target: These functions are accomplished primarily by the use of encryption keys.

segment.source: The TPM is typically installed on the motherboard of a computer or laptop and communicates with the rest of the system by using a hardware bus.
segment.target: The TPM is typically installed on the motherboard of a computer or laptop and communicates with the rest of the system by using a hardware bus.

segment.source: Computers that incorporate a TPM can create cryptographic keys that can be decrypted only by the TPM.
segment.target: Computers that incorporate a TPM can create cryptographic keys that can be decrypted only by the TPM.

segment.source: A TPM lockout can occur if a user enters an incorrect PIN too many times.
segment.target: A TPM lockout can occur if a user enters an incorrect PIN too many times.

segment.source: The number of times that a user can enter an incorrect PIN before the TPM locks varies from manufacturer to manufacturer.
segment.target: The number of times that a user can enter an incorrect PIN before the TPM locks varies from manufacturer to manufacturer.

segment.source: The Key Recovery data system on the MBAM administration website enables you to obtain a reset TPM owner password file.
segment.target: The Key Recovery data system on the MBAM administration website enables you to obtain a reset TPM owner password file.

segment.source: Make sure that you know how to attempt data recovery from encrypted drives in the event of hardware failure, changes in personnel, or other situations in which encryption keys are lost.

segment.source: The Encrypted Drive Recovery features of MBAM provide the capture and storage of data and availability of tools required to access a BitLocker-protected volume when the volume goes into recovery mode, is moved, or becomes corrupted.
